Title: Online shopping is full of copycats
Description:
Let’s be real: the internet is full of a lot of the same stuff.
From derivative content on social media to websites that all look the same, what was once a portal to new worlds and experiences has been feeling a bit dry recently, like I’ve seen all this stuff…

Title: Hurricane Katrina was a catalyst for change in New Orleans' public defender office
Description:
Hurricane Katrina exposed longstanding flaws in the New Orleans criminal justice system.
In the 20 years since, there has been dramatic change in the public defender office.

Title: What's the secret to India's moves to conquer the global chess scene?
Description:
With the Women's World Cup in the bag and 88 grand masters, India is ready to take over the chess world.
And they're making sure their youngsters are poised to checkmate.

Title: The hottest jobs today didn't exist a few years ago — and degrees won't get you there, one of LinkedIn's top economists told BI
Description: From data scientist to content creator, many job titles didn't exist 20 years ago, said LinkedIn's head economist for Asia-Pacific.

Title: This startup offered ride-hailing for women years before Uber and Lyft — and its founder isn't shying away from the competition
Description:
Ride-hailing app HERide has offered rides to women and other groups since 2022.
Now, it's planning to take on Uber and Lyft.

Title: Bowling alleys, movie theaters, and a $200 million ballroom: What first families have added to the White House throughout history
Description: Throughout US history, first families have made the White House their own with new amenities and additions, from bowling alleys to basketball courts.

Title: Unemployment among Black Americans is rising. Why that may be a bad sign for the economy.
Description: Economists say the rise in unemployment among Black Americans could be a troubling sign for the economy at large.

Title: Microsoft CVP thinks we'll be ditching mice and keyboards in a future version of Windows in favor of AI chats — "The world of mousing around and typing will feel as alien as it does to Gen-Z to use MS-DOS."
Description: What might Windows 12 or even Windows 13 look like? Microsoft CVP David Weston has some ideas, and they strongly revolve around AI.

Title: When Medieval & Early Modern Europeans Cleansed with Poison: The Strange History of Antimony Cups and Pills
Description:
